titles.title: Drug Kingpin Death Penalty Enhancement Act
To amend title 18, United States Code, to modify the death penalty for drug kingpins.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Crime.

bill.summary: 1/7/1997--Introduced. Drug Kingpin Death Penalty Enhancement Act - Amends the Federal Death Penalty Act of 1994 (title VI of the Violent Crime Control and Law Enforcement Act of 1994) to eliminate a requirement that specified Controlled Substances Act offenses committed as part of a continuing criminal enterprise involve not less than twice the quantity of controlled substance or twice the gross receipts currently required for imposition of a life sentence in order to impose the death penalty.
